review: You should advertise more clearly that this does not come with any subscriptions
author: cory thomas

review: Its too slow, I thought it was my service but when I hook up my laptop to tv, netflix and other streaming video is uninterrupted, while the fire stick, ever 2 minutes its loading.  Maybe its not enough gigs or something but I regret paying $35 for it.
author: george garza

review: It seems to work for what we need. It arrived quicker than was first stated when we put the order in. Great quality and fast service. Thank you for a job well done.
author: Tina Miller

review: I am enjoying my  fire stick, should have got it sooner.
author: Sabrina Brooks

review: Won't stay connected to wifi. Does not work. I have a Ps4 connected by wifi right next to it and ps4 works great.
author: Ryan

review: I love the fire stick it works really well for streaming easy for my wife and my son to use I would give it more stars if I could
author: Matthew evans
